page.description: Generate a SQL Drop User statement.
page.syntax: SQL_Statement as C = GenerateDropUserStatement as C (User as C)

argument.name: SQL_Statement
argument.description: An add user group statement appropriate for the database.

argument.name: User
argument.description: The name of the group to create.

page.discussion: The .GenerateDropUserStatement() method returns the SQL statement that will delete a user.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection conn.open("{A5API=Access,FileName='C:\Program Files\A5V8\MDBFiles\Alphasports.mdb',UserName='Admin'}") ? conn.GenerateDropUserStatement("Tom") = "DROP USER Tom"
